channel.title: management on Engineering Field Notes
channel.description: Recent content in management on Engineering Field Notes

item.description: How long should you work a time A break is ~15 minutes. Before noon, 90 minutes a time before taking a break; After noon, take a break every hour.1 Here’s exactly how long your work breaks should be ↩︎

High-Intensity Circuit Training Using Body Weight HICT can be a fast and efficient way of lose weight and fat and an efficient approach to decreasing insulin resistance too.1 8-12 repetitions are recommend by ACSM for each major muscle group of a bout1 people with hypertension or deart disease should avoid isometric exercises. 1 It may NOT good for training for absolute strength, specific endurance and other specific performance.1 Exercise Order

How to find which process has occupied a specific port Methods netstat1 sudo apt install net-tools sudo netstat -ltnp lsof1 sudo apt install lsof sudo lsof -i :80 DON’T forget the : before the port number fuser1 sudo apt install psmisc # show a port number is listening by a process number sudo fuser 3306/tcp # check the process name by the process number ps -p [processID] -o comm= Usability Test Method Linux Mac netstat ✅ ❌ lsof ✅ ✅ fuser ✅ ❌ Linux: Find Out Which Port Number a Process is Listening on ↩︎
Meek使用前置域名，将Tor流量伪装成访问其他HTTPS站点的流量。1 基于云流量混淆的Tor匿名通信识别方法 ↩︎

item.title: My First Post
item.description: fdjakfjda;jk 附近的考拉范德萨看赖健；理发师简单快乐 fdsajkfldaklf

Since AWS lambda bills according to the number of calls and computing time. We can use parallel process to reduce the time to save the cost1. with concurrent.futures.ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=60)as executor: result = executor.map(core_function, iterable) Halving our AWS Lambda bill with parallel processing in Python ↩︎

“Ansible: Setup, Configure, and Ad Hoc Commands Deep Dive” study note The course focuses on ad hoc commands of Ansible about Ansible ansible is run a task against a single host ansible-playbook is running a set of tasks against a single or a groups of hosts ##how to setup ansible default inventory file: /etc/ansible/hosts it’s recommended to add a new user for ansible. Besides security considerations, systems may not share the same user name in default.
所谓的“1万小时学习”，更多的是强调学习方法。在不正确或者低效率的方法下，收益可能远不如话费的时间价值大。 这种学习方法包括： 永远只在“学习区
confirmation bias （确认偏误） 是一种心理认知倾向：人们倾向于主动寻找自己相信的信息，即使有相反的信息，也可能会被用来加强已有的观念。1 主动获取和自己观点相
minimal path to success providing short-term rewards and then continuously help to customers is the minimal path to awesome1. “PEOPLE NEED MY PRODUCT!” (BUT DO THEY WANT IT?) ↩︎

What’s zombie startups? companies that have the outside appearance of a startup but that aren’t moving that quickly and that are likely to always stay small, kept alive with suboptimal sources of funding (bad angel investors, subsidies, grants, etc.)1 [[Avoiding Zombie Startups - Welcome to The Family]] ↩︎

Unfamiliarity impedes adoption of productions. A product should be improved and innovated with a similarity of existence, which makes users easier to understand and expect1. [[California Roll Rule: The Familiar Done Differently | NirandFar]] ↩︎

OSPF study notes Packet type: Hello: discover and maintain neighbornood DBD: LSA header information, like a dictionary of LSAs LSR: request LSA LSU: update LSA (may contain several LSA) LS ACK: confirmation LSA type: Type advertizer scope content 1 all routers running ospf local area directly connected interfaces 2 DR local area mask of a MA network 3 ABR AS summary of LSA 1 & 2 4 ABR in which area an ASBR exist AS where the ASBR is 5 ASBR AS external routes 6 Group Membership LSA 7 ASBR of NSSA in the NSSA external routes 8 all routers in IPv6 (LSA 1 for ipv6) 9 DR in IPv6 (LSA 2 for ipv6) 10 MPLS TE 11 MPLS TE Route types:

STP study notes used to prevent loop in L2 by selecting root bridge to make a tree-like logical topology Election: Priority. smaller is better MAC. smaller is better steps of Blocking a interface: all ports of the root bridge are designated interfaces, in forwarding state select all root port on non-root bridges, in forwarding state select designated interfaces in the rest networks, priority -> cost -> mac (smaller is better) block the rest interfaces root port selection rule:

Partnership Fallacy a simply combination of people/firms/teams with different strength & weakness doesn’t necessary mean a better team, ideas are biased based on their strength and often lack wholistic view1. [[Bill Barnett on Strategy: The Partnership Fallacy]] ↩︎

ratio between lines written and in production The ratio lines of codes, words of books and etc. is 10:1 between lines ever written and lines in final production.1 [[The 10:1 rule of writing and programming]] ↩︎

Pros & Cons of using microservices Pros: Easier to test, deploy, and monitor since each service works independently, service can scale better at a specific bottleneck can serving older and newer version at the same time, and let older ones phase out gradually development, test & deployment of each service is independent Cons: latency between services and management issue A service depending on several calls to others may suffer from a huge delay different teams may work on the same/similar service at the same time, extra assessments are needed.
Meeting Meetings with purposes are good, otherwise they are finding problems with solutions.1 informal chat is also a meeting, that is useful [[Bill Barnett on Strategy: Delete All Meetings!]] ↩︎

HSRP study notes Active, Standby routers: Active: the router forwards packets in a HSRP group Standby: the router listens in a HSRP group Hello packet send 224.0.0.2 election rule: priority (default is 100) > interface ip (bigger is better) State machine: Initial Learn Listen Speak Standby Active
